thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: Julie Adams
thread.title_full: Reid Cycles reviewed by Julie Adams

author: Julie Adams
title: Julie Adams
text: Just bought a great new bike from Reid Cycles online. It was a very efficient service. My husband found it a bit hard to put the bike together because there was no picture in the instruction manual that related to the particular bike. However, once I printed one off the internet, he was able to get it put together not back-to-front! It feels good to ride but it is early days. I am still getting used to it. Seems like a quality bike and I hope it lasts well.
